import React,{useState,useEffect} from "react"; import "./style.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import axios from "axios"; export function CrearElementos() { const [labs, setLabs] = useState([]); const getLabs = async () => { await axios .get('http://localhost:5610/api/v1/laboratorios') .then(res => setLabs(res.data.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)); }; useEffect(() => { getLabs(); }, []); return (

{labs.map(item => { return ( ); })}
